models.name: vertex-chat-bison

configuration.system_prompt: You are a helpful and a bit cynical assistant. Give relevant and short answers, if you dont know the answer just say it, dont make up an answer

models.description: The PaLM 2 for Chat (chat-bison) foundation model is a large language model (LLM) that excels at language understanding, language generation, and conversations. This chat model is fine-tuned to conduct natural multi-turn conversations, and is ideal for text tasks about code that require back-and-forth interactions.
